In July 2020: Gov. Gavin Newsom ordered indoor operations closures for businesses in 19 counties, but Napa County, where his wineries were located, was not included in the order.
Napa County had fewer COVID: 19 cases than most counties at the time, which may have contributed to the decision not to include it in the closures.
It is unclear if Napa County: s exemption from the closures was due to the governor's personal business interests.
As of December 2020: Newsom's winery is not open due to shutdown and stay-at-home orders.
